name: KITS
description:
KITS is an assembler game.

Picture a collection of model kits and never mind the glue. It makes things far too messy anyway.

Choose a KIT, then
* number of pieces - affects the amount and the complexity
* challenge level - casual zen to laser-focused
* start distribution - order or chaos
* use the guide... or the hints... or maybe just roll up your sleeves and conquer
* track your best time (if you're one of those)

Once complete, sit back and admire the result, maybe find a welcome surprise or two.

Then bust it up and try with more pieces this time. Perhaps a higher challenge level. Follow your mood.

KITS is not a sandbox builder or creator game. It is however a little showcase of some of the amazing 3D artwork and music that talented people around us are creating. KITS turns their works into fun, engaging, and beautiful little puzzles for all to enjoy.

KITS comes from the love of 3D models, puzzles, and how darn cute small things can be. It is the result of a single little developer standing on the shoulders of talented giants.
